name: Verify POST for a Skill when user logged with UserName with Password -- @1.2

steps.name: Given Skills User is on Endpoint: url/Skills with valid username and password
When skills User sends POST request body in skills from "Skills_POST" and 1 with valid JSON Schema
Then skills User validates the StatusCode and the StatusMessage from "Skills_POST" sheet and 1 row
And JSON schema is valid for POST/PUT METHOD in Skills
And skills User should receive the skill in JSON body from "Skills_POST" and 1
And skills check the Database with Skill id for POST/PUT from "Skills_POST" and 1

fullName: To check The POST method for Skills: Verify POST for a Skill when user logged with UserName with Password
